name: Into The Dungeon
description:
Into the Dungeon is a cooperative roguelike deckbuilder that can be played in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer. The game takes place in a fantasy world filled with mystical creatures, and its main mechanics revolve around deckbuilding, fast-paced card battles and roguelike perma death.

Be sure to wishlist Into the Dungeon on steam!



What makes Into the Dungeon different from other cooperative card-battlers is that all players act in real time. Removing turns for allies increases the pace of the game and requires you and your teammates to communicate effectively to ensure victory.



Into the Dungeon supports co-op adventures with up to four heroes facing fantastical and challenging foes. In singleplayer you delve into the dungeon solo, restarting if you die. In multiplayer, your friends can help you battle, restarting only when the entire party is wiped out.

Join the Into the Dungeon Discord to keep up to date on the games progress.
